description: Custom - Dashboard for Kubernetes cluster with Prometheus.

targets.expr:
sum(kube_pod_info * on (node) group_left (role) kube_node_labels{node=~"$cluster"}) /
sum(kube_node_status_allocatable{resource=~"pods"} * on (node) group_left (role) kube_node_labels{node=~"$cluster"}) * 100

sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource=~"cpu"} * on (node) group_left (role) kube_node_labels{node=~"$cluster"}) /
sum(kube_node_status_allocatable{resource=~"cpu"} * on (node) group_left (role) kube_node_labels{node=~"$cluster"}) * 100

sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource=~"memory"} * on (node) group_left (role) kube_node_labels{node=~"$cluster"}) /
sum(kube_node_status_allocatable{resource=~"memory"} * on (node) group_left (role) kube_node_labels{node=~"$cluster"}) * 100

title: Kubernetes Capacity 2
